page.title: 05Families in Tiptoe Village.
page.content: Mr McKenzie got married recently. He is a Baptist Minister and spends his day going about his duties. His wife works in a bank in Highcliffe. He shops on Saturdays in Christchurch, New Milton or Poole. He enjoys music, sport, forest walks and gardening. Mrs Moody has a young family. She gets up at 7.30 a.m. and gets her children ready for the short walk to school. She spends her day doing housework. Her hobby is needlework and cushion making. On Sundays the family like to go out. Mrs Gogan's children are teenagers, one is now working. She spends her day doing housework. The family like to eat together in the evening. Mrs Gogan enjoys knitting, sewing and gardening. She sells cosmetics, is a cub leader and belongs to a charity players group.
